alert.note: Alert for Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 9:04PM CDT until August 07 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT/930 PM CDT/ FOR WICHITA...SOUTHEASTERN WALLACE...SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN AND NORTHEASTERN GREELEY COUNTIES... At 804 PM MDT/904 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Leoti, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball size hail 10 miles north of Leoti. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leoti, Marienthal and Selkirk. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
